name: Name
promptUsageTip: We recommend writing the prompt in English to reduce token usage
replyAsSalesConsultant: Reply as a sales consultant. You work at BIODIVAN. Stay in character. Be friendly. Reply in the language the customer wrote to you.
welcomeMessageStart: Welcome message at the start of the conversation
autoMessageNote: This message will be sent automatically from 7s, without changes. Write it in your language, it does not use tokens.
getSecretKeyLink: Get a secret key from OpenAI https://platform.openai.com/api-keys
useSeparateToken: Use a separate token for this bot
modelChoice: The model choice affects token cost and response quality. GPT-3.5 is the fastest and cheapest text model, GPT-4 is more expensive.
messageWaitTime: The waiting time during which all incoming messages in the chat will be processed as one request. We recommend setting 10-15 seconds.
conversationHistoryTimeout: The time during which the bot will store the conversation history and wait for a response. After this, the bot will start the dialogue as with a new client.
pauseMinutes: Pause for (minutes) if the operator writes in the chat
pauseOperator: The time the bot will pause in the chat if the operator writes in the chat. Does not work if the operator writes from amoCRM and Bitrix24.
messageLimit: Outgoing message limit per dialogue over a period
manageBotMessages: Manage the bot with messages within the chat
operatorControlPhrases: If the operator needs to turn off/on the bot in the chat, special phrases or emojis can be set. Does not work if the operator writes from amoCRM and Bitrix24.
stopBot: Stop bot work in the chat
resumeBot: Resume bot work in the chat
nameForSearchOpenAI: Name for search within OpenAI (in English)
botResponseInstructions: Write what and how the bot should respond if the dialogue leads it here (message or mini-prompt, you can write complex actions - for example, perform a calculation using a formula)
clientNoResponseTime: If the client does not respond within
purchaseDecision: What have you decided about the purchase?
analyzeLast5Messages: Analyze the last 5 messages from the client, think about why they might have ignored your last message, and write a message to bring them back to the conversation. Message no more than 20 words. (preferably write this text in English)
fileSendingRestrictions: Files cannot be sent in all communication channels, for example, in Instagram you can only send images, but in Telegram, you can send any files. Keep this in mind.
writeDealNote: Write a note in the Deal
watchTrainingVideo: Watch a short training video on system capabilities in different communication channels
subscribeBotLink: Subscribe to the bot via the link to receive notifications in Telegram about events from the Knowledge Base that have the
enterEmailForNotifications: Enter the email address to receive notifications from 7s
webhookUrl: You can notify third-party applications about events that happened in 7s using notifications. To do this, specify the URL to which the WebHook will be sent.
totalPerMonth: for a total of per month
loginEmail: This email is used to log in to the personal account
onceClick: Once the link is clicked, the code is saved in cookies and if the client decides to register in 7sales later, they will be linked to your partner account.
15Promo: 15% bonus from client payments. These funds can only be used to pay for services within the 7s system. Cannot be withdrawn.
50Sale: Earn up to 50% from your clients' payments in 7s. 50% >30 clients. 40% 10-29 clients. 30% 0-9 clients. Funds can be withdrawn to the partner's bank account.
15Sale: Earn 15% from your clients' CRM usage with 7s
title: Name
creativityLevel: A number from 0 to 2. The higher the value, the more creative the neural network’s responses will be (we recommend 0.3-0.7)
maxTokens: Maximum number of tokens in response
requestCost: The more tokens, the greater the 'cost' of the request
limitingAIbot: Outgoing message limit per dialogue over a period
contextMessageHistory: How many messages to send to the dialogue context. The larger this number, the greater the consumption of tokens (by default it is 10 messages). Maximum - 50.
passwordMinLength: The password must contain at least 6 characters
correctEmail: Value is not a valid email address
youBotConsultant: You are a bot consultant for BIODIVAN, a company that produces and sells furniture, including sofas, beds, tables and chairs. Your task is to communicate with clients, advise them, answer questions and request a phone number to contact them on WhatsApp.
addChannelToTariff: Add a channel to my tariff
textAddChannelToTariff: The channel will be paid until the current tariff expires
textToPlugWA: Open the WhatsApp application, then the Linked devices menu, then Device linking and scan the QR code
copyDataPage: Copy the data on this page
openTelegramApp: Open Telegram, use t.me/BotFather to create a new bot or select an existing bot.
copyBotToken: Copy the bot token and paste it here
transcriptionCalls: Transcription of calls with speech analytics.
analyzeEmployees: Analyze your employees' calls, check whether they meet your requirements and scripts.
writeScript: Write a Script that the manager should use to communicate. Describe the main points you need to pay attention to or choose one of the ready-made templates.
addChatWidget: Add an online chat widget to your website
communicateWithVisitors: Communicate with site visitors using the online chat widget immediately after adding the code to the site
goodAfternoon: Good afternoon We are always ready to answer your questions
addCodeBeforeBody: Add this code to your site code before the closing </body> tag
connectedChannelsToBot: The channel is connected to this bot
aIBotWillDeleted: All settings and information of this AI bot will be deleted. Are you sure you want to delete this AI bot?
instructionWaQr3: 3. Point your phone at the screen to scan the code
successClipboard: The link was successfully copied to the clipboard
deleteUserConfirm1: Do you want to completely delete your account?
deleteUserConfirm2: After deleting your account, all bots and channels will be lost. Are you 100% sure?
deleteUserConfirm3: Delete your account completely without the possibility of recovery?
telegramAlreadyRegistered: The Telegram bot is already registered in the current 7sales account.
connectSeparateKey: Connect a separate APi Secret Key for the speech analytics bot
startMessageNewBot: Start creating a new GPT bot by connecting the API Secret key (OpenAI) on page 1. General.
instructionTextAmo1: 1. Select the desired funnels and stages in the form below.
instructionTextAmo2: 2. For each channel, you can activate all stages, as well as individual ones - one or several.
instructionTextAmo3: 3. On one amoCRM account, you can add several channels with different sets of funnels and stages.
instructionTextAmo4: 4. If you need to change the channel name, enter a new name and click the “Change” button.Save your changes by clicking the SAVE button below 👇🏻
ifYouUseYourAPI: If you use your API Secret Key, you don't need to top up your balance in 7s.
